dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 2129 IH: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Independent Agencies, National Archives and Records Administration, Office of Inspector General for fiscal year 2024.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Biggs (for himself, Mr. Rosendale, Mr. Gaetz, Mr. Good of Virginia, Mr. Roy, and Mr. Crane) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Independent Agencies, National Archives and Records Administration, Office of Inspector General for fiscal year 2024.

section.header: Limitation on availability of funds for Independent Agencies, National Archives and Records Administration, Office of Inspector General for fiscal year 2024
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of the law, amounts authorized to be appropriated or otherwise available for Independent Agencies, National Archives and Records Administration, Office of Inspector General for fiscal year 2024 may not exceed $4,823,000.
